means: 在（法律上或道德上）合格的

sentence.Network_en: Millions of householders are eligible to claim the new council tax benefit.
sentence.Network_cn: 数百万房主都有资格申请新的市政税优惠。

sentence.Network_en: He is eligible now to file a motion for a new trial.
sentence.Network_cn: 他现在有资格提议重新进行审判。

sentence.Network_en: 96 per cent of the eligible employees took up the offer.
sentence.Network_cn: 符合条件的雇员有96%接受了这个条件。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via French from late Latin eligibilis, from Latin eligere 'choose, select' (see elect)

entry.tran: 有资格的;符合条件的;有能力的
entry.def: Someone who is eligible to do something is qualified or able to do it, for example because they are old enough.

example.ex: Almost half the population are eligible to vote in today's election...
example.tran: 大约有一半人有资格参加今天的选举投票。

example.ex: You could be eligible for a university scholarship.
example.tran: 你也许有资格获得大学奖学金。

entry.tran: （作为结婚对象）合适的，中意的
entry.def: An eligible man or woman is not yet married and is thought by many people to be a suitable partner.

example.ex: He's the most eligible bachelor in Japan.
example.tran: 他是日本最为抢手的单身汉。

means.word_mean: 1. qualified for or allowed or worthy of being chosen;

auth_sentence.content: Candidates must be eligible to work in the UK.
auth_sentence.res_content: Candidates must be eligible to work in the UK.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Candidates must be eligible to work in the UK.

auth_sentence.content: More than a million people are eligible world wide.
auth_sentence.res_content: More than a million people are eligible world wide.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: More than a million people are eligible world wide.

auth_sentence.content: Unfortunately, they have not been eligible to work.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unfortunately, they have not been eligible to work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unfortunately, they have not been eligible to work.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =tie,bind,表示"捆绑,联合,约束"; 2. =choose,gather,表示"选择,收集"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强+lig捆绑,联合,约束+ate……的→adj.有责任的
re+lig捆绑,联合,约束+ious……的→受信念约束的
di分开+lig选择,收集+ent……的→分开选择,收集的,不一起选→勤勉的,勤奋的
e出+leg=lig选择,收集+ant……的→选出的→好的,高雅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 符合条件的;[尤指婚姻等]合适[意]的
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+lig选择,收集+ible……的→选出来的→合适[意]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 聪明的, 伶俐的, 有才智的, [计]智能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intel=inter在……中间+lig选择,收集+ent……的→adj.聪明的, 伶俐的, 有才智的, [计]智能的
re+lig捆绑,联合,约束+ion表名词→受信念约束

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优雅;优美,雅致;精致,巧妙
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+leg=lig选择,收集+ance表名词→好的,高雅的→优雅;优美

stems_affixes.value_cn: 智力,聪明;理解力;情报,消息,报导
stems_affixes.word_buile: intel=inter在……中间+lig选择,收集+ence性质,状态→在中间选出好的人→智力
neg没有+lig选择,收集+ence表名词→没有选出→疏忽
ob加强+lig捆绑,联合,约束+e→加强限制→迫使

means.word_mean: 有资格当选的, 有条件被选中的

sentences.en: He is an eligible young man.
sentences.cn: 他是一个合格的年轻人。

sentences.en: Only native-born citizens are eligible for the U.S. Presidency.
sentences.cn: 只有本国出生的公民才有资格担任美国总统的职务。

sentences.en: This man is an eligible leader.
sentences.cn: 这人是一个合适的领导。

jushi.chinese: 安妮嫁给了一位合适的单身汉。

jushi.english: This man is an eligible leader.
jushi.chinese: 这人是一个合适的领导。

jushi.english: He is an eligible young man.
jushi.chinese: 他是一个合格的年轻人。
